# strands-agents-mcp-server

MCP server for strands agents.

## Installation

```bash
pip install strands-agents-mcp-server
```

## Usage

Run the MCP server:

```bash
strands-mcp-server
```

Or use it programmatically:

```python
from strands_agents_mcp_server import main

# Add usage examples here
```
